segments.text: Hello , this is Julie from Google Corp . Is that Jin Lili ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is Jin Lili . What can I do for you
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to impart the news that you are supposed to have an interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is too much static on the line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I said that you are supposed to have an interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pardon ? I can hardly hear you . I will call you later .
segments.speaker: S2
